thread.title: William Lowe
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by William Lowe

author: William Lowe
title: William Lowe
text: Cindy Peck at Costa Rica Vacations has helped me with two holiday season bookings and has been amazing. She got us in to Arenas Del Mar late one year and arranged transfers from airport (they met us BEFORE customs) AND when the volcano closed the airport i called her and she got us in to Xandari at the last minute to wait a day for the airport to open. Would have been a disaster without her. I highly recommend working with Costa Rica Vacations.
